      • rounds_per_game

        public static int rounds_per_game
        The number of rounds that are played per game

      • die_sides

        public static int die_sides
        The maximum value that can be rolled by the dice. In this case, we are using a 6 sided dice so this value is 6.

      • database_path

        public static java.lang.String database_path
        The full path of the YAML document that holds user usernames and passwords, and their high scores.

    • Method Detail

      • open_menu

        public static int open_menu()
        Displays menu, asks user for input If the number is between 1 and 4, it is returned. If it is not a number or not in the range, the user is asked again.
        Returns:
        Integer chosen option

      • tieBreaker

        public static void tieBreaker()
                       throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                              java.lang.Exception
        Runs a tie-breaker. Rolls one dice per player, and adds the rolled numbers to their running total. The rolled die are output, and if the scores are no longer equal then the game ends. If the scores are still equal, another tie-breaker is run.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - error with sleeping thread
        java.lang.Exception - database file could not be updated

      • endGame

        public static void endGame()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Determines which player is the winner, and gets their username. The high scores of both players are updated. The winner and loser is announced.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - database file could not be updated

      • playersTurn

        public static void playersTurn(int player_number)
        Rolls 2 die, if they're the same then roll a third. Calculates the points of the round, adds extra points, then adds them to the running total. Outputs the player's turn.
        Parameters:
        player_number - who's turn is it

      • newRound

        public static void newRound(int round_number)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                            java.lang.Exception
        Announces the new round, then runs the turns of player 1 and 2, and then starts the next round. If the maximum number of rounds has been played, it will check the score of both players. If the scores are equal, a tie breaker will start. If not, then the winner is announced.
        Parameters:
        round_number - number to display for this round
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - error with sleeping thread
        java.lang.Exception - database file could not be updated

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                        java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - error with sleeping thread
        java.lang.Exception - database file could not be updated
